name: LaserChain
description:
“There is not a step of earth that has not seen slaughter, a solemn place every inch. Perhaps peace is a phantom term” - The Oracle

Compete and strategize in this imaginative and exciting multi-genre indie gem.

Choose a faction and fight for power...or ideals.

Use your buildings, craft, trade and battle to collect LaserChain, a futuristic in-game currency that you can withdraw and and sell for Bitcoin.

Build an epic space base and construct colossal robot armies. Team up with others or go it alone. Fun aggressive PVP play mixed with engaging simulation/strategy elements.

• Dynamic Gameplay! An evolving strategy war game that blends the best of both genres. Start withat PVE and move to PVP planets once your base is souped up.

• Build a massive space army of exciting laser mechs, tanks and aircraft.

• Crafting and chemistry options give you innumerable options for boosts and upgrades.

• A realistic market economy! Buy and sell crafted and mined items on a bustling global market.

• Centurions are super mega robots that you can level up and trade with other players.

• A fascinating sci-fi storyline with fun, magnetic characters that dig deep and keep you immersed.

• Join your faction, collect laserchain, and dominate the planet!
